headline: Pioneering Generative AI for Nursing
description: Kabilah is the most trusted enterprise-grade AI platform designed specifically for nursing workflows. We reduce burnout, enhance system efficiency, and enable high quality care.

founders.description: recent cancer survivor :) an intimate experience with the US healthcare system drives me to push positive change for the superheroes that saved my life. Also, I love formula 1 racing.

[ Request a Demo ](https://www.kabilah.com/<contact>)
#  GENERATIVE AI FOR NURSING WORKFLOWS 
#  Kabilah is the most trusted enterprise-grade AI platform designed specifically for nursing workflows. We alleviate burnout, enhance system efficiency, and enable high quality care. 
  * [ Request a Demo ](https://www.kabilah.com/<contact>)
  * [ Calculate Your Impact ](https://www.kabilah.com/<impact>)


Join the movement with Kabilah 
Our Solution 
##  The Kabilah Platform 
Kabilah's features are designed to solve the most pressing issues for inpatient nursing workflows. 
![Voice to Text](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/features/handoff.png)
####  Consistent & Complete Verbal Handoff 
Kabilah offers a proprietary solution for all transitions of care - from the ER, all the way to discharge. This system guarantees every verbal handoff is thorough and accurate by notifying nurses of any missing critical information and providing corrections for inaccuracies, ensuring reliable and effective communication. 
![Voice to Text](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/features/notes.png)
####  Simple Digital Report Sheets 
Kabilah revamps fragmented paper report sheets into a clean digital format that saves time and eliminates the risk of lost or incorrect information. Nurses no longer need to rewrite all patient details at the beginning of each shift by hand, and everything they need is consistently in one place. 
![Voice to Text](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/features/flowsheet.png)
####  Guided Task Management 
Kabilah streamlines task management by generating a context-aware ToDo list that prioritizes urgency and organizes tasks for optimal efficiency. Our platform simplifies workflows, ensuring the highest degree of patient safety while making the day more manageable for each nurse. 
![Voice to Text](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/features/vtt.png)
####  Efficient Charting & Flowsheet Completion 
Kabilah integrates with your health system's tech stack, eliminating the need for redundant charting. Nurses can export their report sheets to various note types and flowsheets within the EHR, reducing documentation burden and allowing more focus on patient care. 
For Nurses 
##  Every superhero needs their sidekick. 
Kabilah leverages cutting-edge artificial intelligence to guide error free patient handoffs, simplify task management, and automate charting by integrating seamlessly with EHR systems. Designed to alleviate cognitive overload, Kabilah allows you to spend more time focusing on patient care. By streamlining workflows, Kabilah returns valuable time to nurses. 
[ Request a Demo ](https://www.kabilah.com/<#contact>)
![about image](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/about/test1.jpg)
![about image](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/about/test2.jpg)
44%  of nurses  who quit report burnout as the primary cause 
##  Nurses First.
Our mission is to empower nurses by building a supportive community that uplifts their work and drives meaningful innovation. We aim to equip nurses with the tools and technology needed to reach their full potential. 
But how do you convince your boss that Kabilah is benficial to your hospital? Simple. You prove the ROI behind our technology and we're here to help you do just that. 
[ Download the Email Template ](https://www.kabilah.com/<assets/PDF/Kabilah Request Email Template.pdf>)
For Hospitals 
##  An Enterprise-Grade Solution 
Kabilah comes with everything you need for a successful deployment. 
Built into Your EHR 
Kabilah is compatible with all major EHRs over standard FHIR protocols. Go live in 2-4 weeks. 
HIPAA Compliant 
Kabilah's enterprise-grade technology is 100% HIPAA Compliant with multiple layers of security controls. 
Onsite Support 
Our team of expert educators and engineers are available 24/7 to support on-site deployment. 
Secure Cloud & Encryption 
All your data is encrypted in transit and at rest. It is processed in highly secure, US based data centers and deleted after processing. 
Custom Governance 
Customization to fit your security compliance and data governance needs, including Single Sign-On (SSO) for controlled user access. 
Analytics & Reporting 
Kabilah provides a dedicated portal to monitor usage, including a multitude of key performance indicators and nursing quality metrics. 
Testimonials 
##  What Our Customers Say 
See how Kabilah is revolutionizing nursing by improving the quality of care and transforming nurses' lives. 
"Kabilah is designed to fit easily into our teams’ day-to-day workflows and is helping us better serve our patients by eliminating miscommunication, reducing documentation burden, and ultimately decreasing burnout by keeping our nurses happier. Kabilah is the future of nursing!" 
[ ![author](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/testimonials/Judy.png) Judy McLaughlin, DNP, MS, RN  Chief Nursing Officer ](https://www.kabilah.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/judy-mclaughlin-dnp-ms-rn-56663024/>)
"Kabilah aligns perfectly with our quality improvement initiatives by redesigning fragmented and complex workflows. It ensures more complete handoffs, enhances communication, and has tangible impact on reducing adverse events through its intuitive data management capabilities. Kabilah isn’t just another tool—it’s offering our nurses a greater capacity to impact the health and safety of those we serve." 
[ ![author](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/testimonials/Michael.png) Michael Scicchitano  Sr. Director Nursing Quality & Regulatory Affairs  ](https://www.kabilah.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/michael-scicchitano-a97693194/>)
"Kabilah has completely transformed the way I work. I no longer spend hours on documentation, and the simpler workflows mean I can dedicate more time to my patients. It's a tool that truly understands the challenges nurses face and addresses them head-on." 
![author](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/testimonials/emily.png) Emily Williams, RN, BSN  MedSurg Nurse 
"I was so nervous when I finished nursing school and started my residency program. Being trained during COVID left me with so many gaps in my knowledge, and everything felt so rushed. But honestly, Kabilah has been so helpful! Its guidance during handoff and the digital report sheet have made me feel so much more organized and prepared. Thank you Kabilah!" 
![author](https://www.kabilah.com/assets/images/testimonials/christine.png) Christine Yu, RN, BSN  Nursing Resident
Impact 
##  Calculate Kabilah's ROI at Your Hospital 
Kabilah's implementation will directly save money for your health system. Discover the quantifiable financial benefits by requesting our comprehensive Whitepaper for a detailed ROI analysis. 
[ Request Whitepaper ](https://www.kabilah.com/<javascript:void\(0\)>)

[kah-bee-lah] _noun_ A federation of tribes or a group of _people bound together_ by common ancestry, culture, or tradition, often used to refer to tribal or folk _communities_. Synonyms: tribe, clan, folk, _community_ , collective

generated_description:
### Kabilah: Revolutionizing Nursing with Generative AI

**Company Overview**
Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, Kabilah is on a mission to transform nursing through cutting-edge generative AI technology. With its headquarters in [insert location], the company has rapidly positioned itself as a trusted enterprise-grade platform designed specifically for nursing workflows.

**Mission Statement**
Kabilah seeks to alleviate burnout among nurses, enhance operational efficiency, and ensure high-quality patient care. The company's platform addresses some of the most pressing challenges in nursing, particularly focusing on improving communication and workflow efficiency.

**What Kabilah Does**
Kabilah's AI-driven tools simplify and streamline various tasks within nursing workflows, including:

- **Verbal Handoff System**: A proprietary solution ensures accurate, thorough communication during patient transitions, aiding in better patient outcomes.
- **Digital Report Sheets**: The platform replaces traditional paper report sheets with an intuitive digital interface, reducing errors and saving time.
- **Guided Task Management**: It provides context-aware task lists that help nurses prioritize their workload effectively, improving patient safety and nurse satisfaction.
- **Seamless EHR Integration**: By integrating with existing electronic health records (EHR) systems, Kabilah minimizes redundant documentation, allowing nurses to focus more on patient care.


**The Need for Kabilah**
Burnout remains a critical issue in the healthcare industry, with 44% of nurses who leave their jobs citing it as the primary reason. Kabilah aims to empower nurses by building supportive communities and providing the tools they need to thrive.

**Customer Testimonials**
Kabilah's impact is reflected in the feedback from nursing leaders and practitioners. Professionals have noted how the platform has not only streamlined their workflows but also significantly reduced documentation burdens, allowing them to devote more time to patient care.

**Company Leadership**
Kabilah boasts a team of experienced leaders drawn from tech and healthcare backgrounds. Key figures include:

- **Sarah Raza** (Co-Founder & CEO), a Stanford graduate with experience from Microsoft and OpenSea.
- **Umar Nadeem** (Co-Founder & CTO) and **Aaron Choi** (VP of Research & Development), both also Stanford alumni with deep expertise in computer science and management.

**Future Vision**
Kabilah is poised for further growth and innovation as it continues to refine its solutions and expand its market reach. With a commitment to researching and implementing the most effective tools available, Kabilah is building the future of nursing—one where technology liberates healthcare providers to focus on what they do best.

For more insights and to explore Kabilah’s innovative solutions, visit their website at [Kabilah.com](https://www.kabilah.com).
